response.original_title: Beco - O Coração que Batia Dentro do Ayrton. Documentário, 2024 (Pré-Trailer)
response.overview: A new perspective on Ayrton Senna through the lenses of his family. With exclusive interviews and never-before-seen footage, it reveals unknown aspects of the life of this global hero. Discover the touching story of his niece, who, at her grandmother's request—Ayrton's mother—created a work of art to immortalize the striking gaze of her uncle, the beloved son of Dona Neyde and an eternal idol of Brazil.
response.title: Beco - O Coração que Batia Dentro do Ayrton. Documentário, 2024 (Pré-Trailer)
